contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced stub|auto=yes|date=December 2009}} {{Other uses|Yours truly (disambiguation)}} {{Infobox Single | Name = Yours Truly | Cover = | Artist = [[Blindspott]] | from Album = [[End The Silence]] | Released = 8 April 2005 | Format = CD Single | Recorded = 2005 | Genre = [[Alternative metal]] | Length = 3:29 | Label = [[Capitol Records|Capitol]] | Writer = | Producer = | Last single = | This single = "'''Yours Truly'''"<br/>(2005) | Next single = "[[Drown (Blindspott song)|Drown]]"<br>(2006) }} "'''Yours Truly'''" is a single by [[Blindspott]] released in 2005. It is the fourth track on the band's second album, ''[[End the Silence]]''. It peaked at number nine on the New Zealand singles chart. ==Track listing== #"Yours Truly (Radio Edit)" #"Yours Truly (Alternate Ending)" #"Yours Truly ([[MPEG]] Video)" {{DEFAULTSORT:Yours Truly (Song)}} [[Category:2005 singles]] [[Category:Blindspott songs]] {{2000s-single-stub}}
